EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Registering For Our Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=webinar registrant}},
Thank you for registering for our "Is Independent Consulting Right for You?" Webinar on Friday December 30, 2011. We hope you found it informative. You can find a copy of the 30 minute presentation here (http://www.mbopartners.com/resources). As mentioned, this is just the first of a series of Webinars MBO will be hosting over the next year. We invite you to join our mailing list to keep in touch regarding upcoming events (http://info.mbopartners.com/Webinar.html).
Regards,
Steve Arhancet ___________________________________ STEVE ARHANCET Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners Â t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
